QueryViewSpec.Name: D2 Campaign Business Process Results Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Query to display results of D2 Campaign business process
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: SELECT ID, SPONSORLOOKUPID, D2CAMPAIGNDATE, DATEADDED, case when CAMPAIGNTYPE = 0 then 'Cash' when CAMPAIGNTYPE = 1 then 'EFT Active' when CAMPAIGNTYPE = 2 then 'EFT Held Credit Card' when CAMPAIGNTYPE = 3 then 'EFT Held Direct Debit' when CAMPAIGNTYPE = 4 then 'Phone (all)' end as TYPE, D2INTERACTIONSTATUS FROM dbo.USR_D2_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS_RESULTS
